info.description: This is the Public Nook API. You can use this portal to explore the Nook API or acquire API Keys.
info.title: Public Nook API

get.description: Get bills. Mauris pretium nunc in facilisis efficitur. Nulla iaculis, ligula vel rhoncus mollis, purus ex porttitor nisl, id aliquet lectus justo.

parameters.description: Index to start fetching from. By default we start from the first index, if no index is specified.
parameters.name: start

parameters.description: Number of items to fetch from start onwards. By default we will fetch 100 items if no limit is specified.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Bill name. Mauris pretium nunc in facilisis efficitur. Nulla iaculis, ligula vel rhoncus mollis, purus ex porttitor nisl, id aliquet lectus justo.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: The status of the bills you want to see. You can specify multiple, or none to see bills of any status.
parameters.name: status[]

parameters.description: Filter to draft bills only. By default we will return both draft and non-draft bills.
parameters.name: is_draft

parameters.description: Filter to draft approved only. By default we will return both approved and unapproved bills.
parameters.name: is_approved

parameters.description: Filter to draft overdue only. By default we will return both overdue and non-overdue bills.
parameters.name: is_overdue

parameters.description: ID of the supplier. You can find this supplier ID within your Nook supplier page. [Read the docs](https://www.google.com)
parameters.name: supplier_id

parameters.description: Return bills with due dates on or after this date.
parameters.name: due_date_start

parameters.description: Return bills with due dates on or before this date.
parameters.name: due_date_end

parameters.description: Determines which property you wish to sort the bills upon. By default we will sort on the Bill's due date (chronologically).
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: The company ID you are retrieving bills for. You can find your company ID [here](https://www.google.com).
parameters.name: nook-company-id

schema.title: Response Get Bills Api V1 Bills Get

parameters.name: nook-company-id
